Summary: Biochemical reaction from cotinine to norcotinine. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2A6.
Biochemical reaction from nicotine to nicotine iminium ion. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2B6, CYP2A13 or CYP2A6.
Biochemical reaction from nicotine n-oxide to nicotine.
Biochemical reaction from cotinine to 3-hydroxycotinine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2A6 or CYP2A13.
Biochemical reaction from cotinine to cotinine glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A9, UGT2B10, UGT1A4 or UGT1A1.
Biochemical reaction from nicotine iminium ion to cotinine. This interaction is catalyzed by AOX1.
Biochemical reaction from 3-hydroxycotinine to 3-hydroxycotinine glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B7, UGT2B4, UGT1A9, UGT1A4 or UGT2B15.
Biochemical reaction from nicotine to nicotine n-oxide. This interaction is catalyzed by FMO3.
Biochemical reaction from cotinine to 5-hydroxycotinine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2A6 or CYP2A13.
Biochemical reaction from nornicotine to norcotinine.
Biochemical reaction from cotinine to cotinine n-oxide.
Biochemical reaction from nicotine to nicotine glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B10, UGT1A4 or UGT2B7.
Biochemical reaction from nicotine to nornicotine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2B6, CYP2A13 or CYP2A6.
